website_summaries.verdict: A slightly slimmer model than the other large-capacity options.
pros: A slim model, but still a nice big capacity refrigerator
Full width space inside the fridge
Comes with an in-freezer ice maker
Same LED interior lighting as other higher end models
Tall ice bin with easy on and off switch
Includes an alarm to alert if the door is left open
cons: Does not include an in-door ice and water dispenser

customer_reviews.title: Delivery went smooth, cool new fridge!
customer_reviews.text: After A LOT of research on 33" wide refrigerators (guess I'm old now), I decided to go with this Kenmore Elite model (manufactured by LG). I was about to purchase through Sears, but figured I'd give Amazon a shot, as I buy everything else here. The price was somehow less than Sears (has been corrected in past few days) and the delivery process, like others reported, was actually great. Good communication to confirm delivery time, and the delivery guys were friendly and respectful of my new home. The fridge is ENORMOUS inside, and a well-crafted stainless steel cube on the outside. LED lighting is trick, and it works great. Would recommend buying this fridge off Amazon anytime.
customer_reviews.author: pavementends

customer_reviews.title: Horrific Experience - Broke In A Week - Month Without A Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Hello Everyone, I received my refrigerator on July 12. A part malfunctioned within a week and it became completely dysfunctional. It took a week to receive a repair-person to come. He appeared today August 4th and said he will need to place an order for that new part and that they can only come back on August 17. This means I will have lived without my refrigerator a full month. Even though this refrigerator looks nice in terms of design, I might strongly suggest you look elsewhere, because I have seen a number of people complain that they suffered a similar painful experience. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Officially

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge for a small space!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a 30" fridge with a bottom freezer. This one is GREAT! Love the pantry door and pull out freezer. Still not sure what to put on the "Condiments shelf" on the bottom of the door as the only "condiment" that fits there is a miniature jar of jam! Otherwise a great fridge for a small space! The installers/delivery people did a great job of getting it in and setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the quietest fridge I have ever owned. It looks absolutely great in my kitchen and is so roomy inside. I could not be any happier with it. Delivery was on time, courteous and knowledgeable. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Delivery Service Plus Great Fridge
customer_reviews.text: I shop almost every day on Amazon, usually groceries, clothing, gifts, etc, but this was the first time I purchased a large appliance. I was a little worried about how it would work out, but I needn’t have worried. The delivery truck was right on time and the delivery men had my new refrigerator unpacked & inside in no time. They took the time to set it all up & make sure everything worked right, and they were out the door, taking my old rusty refrigerator with them! I wish all my deliveries could go this well!! I really like this refrigerator too. A bottom freezer is the only way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and badly designed/
customer_reviews.text: Worst refrigerator I have ever owned. Shelves badly desaigned. You cannot adjust the shelves and very little fits. The plastic drawers are made with very thin plastic; They feel cheap, cheap, cheap; won't last for long. *****Every now and then it: Makes a horrible loud whirring sound that seems as though it is about to break.. I am devastated and upset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two issues that keeps it from being great
customer_reviews.text: Two problems: when the ice maker is filling up with water, it sounds more like a balloon and the annoying high-pitched noise it makes when the opening is stretched out...and the main door is sometimes hard to open (strong vacuum?) - sometimes, the refrigerator moves with the pulling of the door before it opens
customer_reviews.author: OldVet55

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Delivery ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fridge, it's quiet and very spacious. Split top shelf made it simple to arrange so that everything fits easily. Cheese drawer is good size and ideally located. Ice maker works good, and freezer divider -- along with some organizer containers I separately bought -- makes items visible & accessible. BEST of all, besides the good price, was the delivery service. These guys were on-time, wore booties to keep my wood floors clean, set everything up including ice maker and hauled away the old fridge. Super fast! VERY impressed; our experience was far better than other stores' appliance delivery services.
customer_reviews.author: Miami Janet

customer_reviews.title: Obviously bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: Disaster, we had our entire meat reserves in this freezer and the cooling system stopped one day after only 2 months of use. Returned for refund. No offer to refund the amount for lost goods. Obviously bad quality!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: marlene

customer_reviews.title: All going great.
customer_reviews.text: Some one else's review first appeared here. This is my actual review: I have owned the fridge now for 3 monhts and it's working well, quieter than our previous Kenmore (which we had for 17 years), and we like the little alarm (pretty quiet) that sounds if a door is left open for more than about 1 minute. Keeping a steady temp in both freezer drawer and fridge. Was delivered and old one removed using Amazon's link to Sears' Kenmore. All was included in price. Guys who delivered were careful and did a great job. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: lovesbooks

customer_reviews.title: Nice fridge
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is holding up good! It’s very spacious and fits in a nice sized kitchen with no problems. The ice maker is my favorite part. The bottom drawer is big for that size so it all works out. It looks very nice on the outside too!
customer_reviews.author: Magdalene Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Nice fridge overall
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a French door style Whirlpool with this, and this hold considerably more even though the outside dimensions are slightly smaller. It's very quiet except when dropping ice; then it's a little noisier than my old one, but not bad. The door seal is so tight it's sometimes hard to get open--but it's nice to know it seals so well. I like having a door alarm in it, too. The freezer section has a top drawer that I find awkward, but overall the section holds a lot and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Frank R.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Really nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and seems well made. Very quiet operation, thermostat is accurate. I noticed that the "color" is reported to be stainless steel but the actual material is not. No magnet will adhere to it, suggesting it is either aluminum or plastic made to look like stainless. That is pretty deceiving, hence only four stars. Addendum: After receiving a very helpful comment about my review, I learned that the stainless in this fridge is austenitic rather than ferritic--hence it is intentionally non-magnetic. Good to know. After several weeks this fridge is performing flawlessly and I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rexford

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Beautiful Addition
customer_reviews.text: So far, we love our fridge. It's beautiful, and the pull out freezer is especially nice, coming from a top swing freezer. We love the way it looks and seems to keep things cold and at the correct temp. We've only had it for a week, but we are very happy! We are not using the ice maker, so can't comment on the sound of that, but otherwise very quiet overall. Only concern would be what happens when Sears goes out of business, which i'm sure it will. Hopefully someone will take over the warranties!
customer_reviews.author: Laura F.

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerator is great, delivery scenario,not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I shopped locally but no one could match the price. Very roomy, good lighting, ice maker works great. It makes occasional noises but not obnoxious. Freezer keeps ice cream at the perfect temperature! Delivery people got their truck stuck because they drove off the driveway into the yard and made giant ruts. Had to call the tractor owning neighbor to pull them out. Make sure your current phone number is on file with Amazon Before you order. Mine was not current, but they didn't bother to knock on the door to find out if they were at the correct address. I had to go out in the rain to tell them they were at the right house.
customer_reviews.author: Janene

customer_reviews.title: shipping and installation through Amazon was great
customer_reviews.text: I got this model because I wanted a energy efficient fridge that got good reviews and was energy efficient. I have been measuring the energy usage of this model (kWh). Its been very low (Still making measurements). The noise of the unit is typical of refrigerators in general. Nothing out of the ordinary or loud. The one think I was worried about was buying online. Shipping and installation through Amazon was great. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful so far so good i replaced my older refrigerator ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful so far so good i replaced my older refrigerator same model with this delivery guys were great and i love the led light inside so roomy one caution be careful when removing the tape off shelves my letters came off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This refrigerator is great. It has a bottom freezer and icemaker
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator is great. It has a bottom freezer and icemaker. There are two crispers for vegetables and a drawer for meats and cheeses. The shelves inside and on the door also provide excellent space for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: We shopped around and decided on this one. Best price, free delivery & free pick up of the old frig. Plus got over $100. credit on my Amazon Visa card. Great deal and the best think my wife likes the frig.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Guzik

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice refrigerator. It works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice refrigerator. It works well . I had to spend an additional $50 for parts that I ordered from Sears to reverse the door. I think Amazon should’ve provided that service.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Delivery service was excellent. Very conveniently scheduled in advance (as I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery service was excellent. Very conveniently scheduled in advance (as I was traveling away from home city). The fridge has been working well. Not sexy looking, but why go for the looks when it is the behind-the-scene quality that counts? Amazon did the right thing by moving into home appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Yuan-min Li

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced, Kenmore quality & durability
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with our new fridge. I thought the freezer would be too small, but so far no concerns. This is a large and roomy fridge that my family loves.
customer_reviews.author: nikkimac69

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for about $400 less than Sears was selling for. Arrived within 2 days and the delivery company was ready to remove the old fridge and install this one at no extra cost. So far it has been a great fridge with no issues. The temperature does fluctuate within 1-2 degrees but that’s not a big issue. There is plenty of space innside both fridge and freezer. It’s only been 6 months since I plugged it in, but I am happy with the purchase. If you have little ones, the fingerprints are very visible. Stainless steel wipes from Home Depot do a good job at keeping the finger oils from sticking to the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge @ great service!
customer_reviews.text: We love this fridge. We didn't like that we couldn't get a frozen pizza in our side by side. Ordered this one after we checked it out in person and read reviews. We had a great delivery team. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mollybeth7

customer_reviews.title: Love my new fridge
customer_reviews.text: Love my new fridge; the only problem is that once in a while I hear a strange sound (might be because I did not connect the water line to the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Love a Kenmore!
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator is great! Great quality. One problem - we got the Amazon delivery and they didn't give us everything out of the box. We wanted to switch the refrigerator door to the right...but couldn't. They didn't give us the parts out of the box. Now we have to buy them. If they don't know what to give the people who bought the product they shouldn't be the ones with the job! Seriously, they have 1 job - to deliver, unbox, setup, give manuals and parts, take away the box. Five steps, five....five....only five...
customer_reviews.author: Randy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Refrigerator/Freezer So much room!
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator freezer has so much room. I am limited on the size because the space is built in next to cabinets. I grew up with type or refrigerator freezer. It is great with one door not two door on the refrigerator, and thank goodness for no water ice dispense in the door which take up so much freezer space. LOVE IT! Also, no charge for delivery and set up and take away the old refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: Updated 9/21/19. Lowered from 4 to 3 stars. Fridge has a really strong vacuum and can be hard to open. My kids can rarely open the fridge and I'm tired of listening to my wife complain about it. Sometimes when the door is seemingly stuck, you can pull hard enough and the whole fridge slides out. It drives my wife and I crazy. Sometimes it opens completely easily/normally. Kenmore only has a toll-free number to call. No chat or email support. Really bad.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY KENMORE
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE MY KENMORE REFRIFERATOR FOR A LITTLE OVER TWO WEEKS AND I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: bernadette gill

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, with cheap plastic drawers
customer_reviews.text: I had little choice in a refrigerator because of space limitations. This looked like my best bet. Others reported that it was quiet ("like a purr"). I find it quite noisy. It chirps and rattles when it comes on, and seems quite loud while running. Otherwise it seems fine, except the cheap plastic drawers, which tend to catch on the humidity levers when you push them in.
customer_reviews.author: M Scott

customer_reviews.title: More efficient for less run time.
customer_reviews.text: Freezer on bottom results in less run time, less energy use, stays very cold. Quieter than previously owned side by side Kenmore model I owned. But the large size does require more strength to open and close. Ice maker in bottom works well and easily accessed.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like this refrig with the bottom freezer. Good usable space.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Great Fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new refrigerator! It was delivered on time and by some very helpful young men. They were even kind enough to change over the door opening for me which I appreciated very much. The fridge works great and I love having the freezer drawer at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Capricorn

customer_reviews.title: Spacious interior
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased so far with this purchase. Interior layout is only thing keeping me from giving fridge 5 stars. I wish all shelves were adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Hunterm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the installation was very quick and easy. nice product with out the hassle of big box sales people
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A couple weeks in. It works so far! Deliver was very good
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator is AMAZING AND SPACIOUS! It is so big, good on the electric bill, and so fresh looking!!! I would DEFINITELY recommend this fridge to anyone looking for more space!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great spacious fridge
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the fridge, the space is well organized especially the bottom drawer. The freezer space and sliding drawer are great too. The installation crew was very efficient.
customer_reviews.author: SophieP

customer_reviews.title: What can I do to eliminate the door from moving when opening the door?
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall quality of the fridge. The innovative design and location of the bins and drawers. The one quirk is that the door moves when you open the door.Other wise I give it a 4 and a half star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great install!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect install. So far, so good (2 months). Would prefer a larger freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce White

customer_reviews.title: We've had this fridge for a month and we love it! Easy to find what you are looking ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this fridge for a month and we love it! Easy to find what you are looking for, lots of great space.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Never bought a refrigerator on line before!
customer_reviews.text: Much prefer it over my previous French door style because there is more room. Installers were quick and knowledgeable as well as professional.
customer_reviews.author: AColbert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about ordering a major appliance online. This process was stress-free from comparing models & reading reviews all through having it flawlessly delivered and placed in my home. It was exactly as described - perfectly sized for two adults. Three months later we are still thrilled and amazed it was so easy.
customer_reviews.author: petra mayne

customer_reviews.title: May work; but, poor design and support
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied, I tried to arrange for a counter depth; but, selection was limited to one. Screws are exposed and if you need to move the handle to open from the right there will be holes exposed to view.
customer_reviews.author: J. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent place to get you Fridge
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit - lots of shelves - works well. Freezer and ice maker work well. Easy set up - nice delivery and removed old unit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: It keep making this horrible noise can’t figure it iut
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: I don't knoe.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like that the small freezer shelf does not extent all the way. Items in the back of this shelf are hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it, so I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Grew up always purchasing appliances from Sears. Gave this a shot in the dark and it worked out perfectly. Deliveres on time, the delivery guys were professional and courteous. So far, working great.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Bottom Freezer fridge is big improvement
customer_reviews.text: Bottom freezer is wonderful. No losing items difficult to reach in bottom of freezer-top fridge. Ice maker works well. Very quiet. Clear glass shelves. Easyto see everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit surprised as to how small the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit surprised as to how small the bottom freezer is. Everything else is up to expectations based on other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: had it for a week now and can't imagine having any other refrigerator! There is so much space that I haven't been able to fill it yet. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks good.
customer_reviews.text: It works great, finger prints show up easily, but clean off easy. Now, that delivery company was a clown-act. Good luck with that part of it.
customer_reviews.author: G. F. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Really Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this refrigerator. It's very quiet, aside from the occasional drawing of water into the ice maker. Very spacious and I like how well lit it is.
customer_reviews.author: AWL

customer_reviews.title: very little space
customer_reviews.text: I was unaware of the limited amount of space in the refrigerator and freezer. It also runs very loud. If you don't have the ice maker hooked up it make sounds like its trying to make ice anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Gillies

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: pefect refrigerator!!!had to ajust the wheels at bottom cuz everytime I opened the frig it rolled.great lighting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great frig. Very sceptical about ordering such a big item but well pleased with frig
customer_reviews.author: Freetoo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for overflows
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, we use this fridge in the basement only to hold beer, ice cream cakes, water and whatever other large items you don't necessarily want taking up space on your main fridge. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: the only white fridge I could find in this size-price range. it's working perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Great fridge. Plenty of space and good lighting both in the fridge and freezer drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Mikala Lowrie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the right size.
customer_reviews.text: Love the freezer drawer! So much more fits in there!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Very large, very quiet, lots of shelving and door space.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Dodds

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Service and delivery was very good. The refrigerator is a little smaller (capacity) than we expected or wanted but it fit nicely into the spot designated for a refrigerator in our home
customer_reviews.author: Buell S.

customer_reviews.title: Free shipping right into my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great price and an awesome bottom freezer perfect size for my kitchen remodel
customer_reviews.author: Diane A

customer_reviews.title: fast service, great fridge!
customer_reviews.text: A fridge from Amazon in just a couple days? I thought it was too good to be true but decided to try it anyway. Quick delivery and set up, the guys were polite and efficient (carried the fridge even!). It's quiet, cools I just received it but really like it. The bottom drawer has a great seal so it pulls the fridge out when you open it. I'm hoping after it has some food in it that won't happen anymore. Drawers in fridge work great. Easy to change shelf height.
customer_reviews.author: KMon

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but.......
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was super smooth as well as set up fridge very nice and spacious, had to return because was to narrow for my space it just didnt look right but again product was great as well as delivery service.
customer_reviews.author: jovanna valadez

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Just over one year owned and the compressor went out. Piece of garbage. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Texasraider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We really liked the bottom freezer and the usable space.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Baum

customer_reviews.title: Did you know you can buy a refrigerator from Amazon?
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised--don't hesitate to purchase large appliances from Amazon. A+
customer_reviews.author: DetectiveME

customer_reviews.title: kenmore refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: so far this has been a good purchase. delivery was great. everything has been as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice fridge.
customer_reviews.text: Great Value 1 year no problems. Smudges easy but but w/e.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: FRIDGE WAS PROBABLY FINE. INSTALLER WAS NOT
customer_reviews.text: I prepped and took the day off to get my new fridge delivered. My installer walked in, mumbled something about a shut off valve, said he couldn't help and left with my new fridge. Entire interaction less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: leaves a lot of finger prints and we don't even have kids ,but the space is nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: X
customer_reviews.text: Well they were late with the delivery, then when we went to readjust it we noticed that there was a dent on the side. No one to contact !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: New refrigerator!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new refrigerator. It is beautiful! Delivery was on time and the delivery guys were awesome! I would do it again!
customer_reviews.author: L.B.

product_meta.title: Kenmore Elite 79043 24.1 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Stainless Steel, includes delivery and hookup
product_meta.description: The Kenmore Elite 24.1 cubic foot Bottom-Freezer Refrigerator is designed to give you plenty of versatile storage space to keep your foods fresher, longer. This Kenmore bottom freezer fridge offers customized storage options in an aesthetically pleasing stainless steel design. With 24.1 cubic feet of interior storage space, this spacious Energy Star certified fridge/freezer combo has more than enough room for all your grocery storage needs. The adjustable split glass shelving offers slide-out access so you can easily access and remove pies, cakes, casseroles, and larger food items. A full-width pantry drawer is perfect for pies, pizzas and party trays. Use the 2 super-sized humidity controlled crisper bins to house your fresh fruits and vegetables. Features Tilt-N-Store, a flip-up door bin that gives you unlimited storage options. It allows for easy access and removal of food, drinks, and condiments. Perfect for storing taller items, like wine bottles and drink pitchers. Small item accommodation on the bottom shelf means more space for snacks and juice boxes for the kids. With multi-air flow technology, the strategically placed vents work to keep cool, fresh air flowing throughout the fridge. Your refrigerated and frozen foods will stay frost-free and chilled no matter where they are stored. Keep drinks ice cold with the included large built-in icemaker. Entertain guests without the worry of running out of ice! Have pre-made meals at-the-ready and treats close at hand in the 2-tier pull-out bottom freezer. Kenmore recommends measuring your space to ensure the freezer/refrigerator combo will fit. DIMENSIONS: 34.88" L x 29.75" W x 68.53" H STORAGE SPACE: 24.1 cubic feet of interior storage space COLOR: Stainless Steel INCLUDES DELIVERY: Purchase includes room of choice delivery, unboxing, item hook-up (including required parts) and free optional haul-away at checkout. Hook-up does not include installation of water line.
feature_bullets: Item includes room of choice delivery, unboxing, item hook-up (including required parts) and free optional haul-away at checkout
24.1 cubic foot capacity with bottom freezer. Full width pantry drawer; split adjustable shelves
Multi Air Flow technology uses venting to help balance cool air throughout the whole fridge, even the door space
Item dimensions are length 34.88 by width 32.75 by height 69.88 inches. Measure the available space to ensure the item will fit.
Gallon storage bins; Tilt-N-Store door bin. Kilowatt Hours per Year : 608. Voltage (V) : 115

Energy Star qualified.To avoid noise and vibration, the unit must be leveled and installed on a solidly constructed floor. If required, adjust the leveling legs to compensate for unevenness of the floor. The front should be slightly higher than the rear to aid in door closing. Leveling legs can be turned easily by tipping the cabinet slightly. Turn the leveling legs to the left to raise the unit or to the right to lower it. (See LeveLIng AnD DooR ALIgnment .)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars125 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
